message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire my product. Given its exceptional value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I believe this to be a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm interested in negotiating a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,600,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is quite reasonable,  the product's value is significantly higher to me. I could consider parting with it for $1,950,000. This reflects a compromise on my end while acknowledging the value you see in it.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,800,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I see in it.
